meanings.definition: A malignant tumor composed of both carcinomatous and sarcomatous elements.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed the patient with a carcinosarcomata.
meanings.sent2: The carcinosarcomata was a rare type of cancer that required specialized treatment.
meanings.sent3: When the carcinosarcomata walked into the room, everyone gasped in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a carcinosarcomata, a mix of anger and sadness.
meanings.sent5: The image of the carcinosarcomata haunted his dreams, a menacing presence in the darkness.
